fixed_skill.desc: Bless dmg to 1 foe (200.0%/210.0%/220.0% Atk). Increase target's Highlight dmg taken 30.0%/31.5%/33.0% (1 turn).
fixed_skill.name: Absolute Obedience

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 130.8/139.1/147.4% of Attack. Gain 1 to 2 Blessing stacks.
innate_skill.name: Kougaon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 45.0/49.3/53.6% of Attack. Low chance to deal a Bless insta-kill effect to foes with 50% or less HP. Increase chance based on foe's missing HP.
innate_skill.name: Mahamaon

innate_skill.desc: Increase the success rate of insta-kill skills by 5.4%.
innate_skill.name: Divine Guidance III

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 65.8/70.0/74.2% of Attack. Gain 1 to 2 Blessing stacks.
innate_skill.name: Makougaon

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of battle, gain 1 God's Ear stack. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. When an ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 God's Ear stack. When a Bless ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 more God's Ear stack. When using a unique skill, spend all God's Ear stacks, and increase foe's Bless damage taken by 4% for each stack. Also, when God's Ear reaches 3 stacks, when a foe takes Bless damage, decrease Defense by 16%.
passive_skill.name: Sinful Listener

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of battle, gain 2 God's Ear stacks. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. When an ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 God's Ear stack. When a Bless ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 more God's Ear stack. When using a unique skill, spend all God's Ear stacks, and increase foe's Bless damage taken by 4% for each stack. Also, when God's Ear reaches 3 stacks, when a foe takes Bless damage, decrease Defense by 16%.
passive_skill.name: Sinful Listener I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of battle, gain 2 God's Ear stacks. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. When an ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 God's Ear stack. When a Bless ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 more God's Ear stack. When using a unique skill, spend all God's Ear stacks, and increase foe's Bless damage taken by 6% for each stack. Also, when God's Ear reaches 3 stacks, when a foe takes Bless damage, decrease Defense by 16%.
passive_skill.name: Sinful Listener II

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of battle, gain 2 God's Ear stacks. Lasts for 3 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. When an ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 God's Ear stack. When a Bless ally uses a Highlight, gain 1 more God's Ear stack. When using a unique skill, spend all God's Ear stacks, and increase foe's Bless damage taken by 6% for each stack. Also, when God's Ear reaches 3 stacks, when a foe takes Bless damage, decrease Defense by 25%.
passive_skill.name: Sinful Listener III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
